TECHNICAL_SECTION.FORM_LG_LIST: DA DE EN ES FI FR EL IT NL PT SV CS ET HU LT LV MT PL SK SL GA BG RO HR

NOTICE_DATA.ORIGINAL_CPV: Laboratory, optical and precision equipments (excl. glasses)
Machines for inspecting the internal surface of pipelines

CODIF_DATA.TD_DOCUMENT_TYPE: Prior information notice without call for competition
CODIF_DATA.RP_REGULATION: European Investment Bank, European Investment Fund, European Bank for Reconstruction and Development
CODIF_DATA.HEADING: BR504

ML_TI_DOC.TI_TEXT: BERD - Projet relatif à l’eau de Batken
BERD - Projeto relativo ao setor da água de Batken
EBOR - Vodohospodářský projekt v obci Batken
EBOR - Projekt dotyczący gospodarki wodnej w miejscowości Batken
EBOR - Vodohospodársky projekt v meste Batken
ЕБВР - Проект за водоснабдяване на Баткен
BERD - Proiect în domeniul apei în Batken
EBRD - Projekt u području voda u Batkenu

CONTENTS.P: Procurement Ref: 8990-GPN-45160
Country: Kyrgyz Republic
Business sector: Municipal and environmental infrastructure
Project Name: Batken Water Sub-Project
Project number: 45160
Funding sources: EBRD
Contract type: Project goods, works and services
Notice type: General procurement notice
Issue date: 19.2.2018
Closing date: 19.2.2019
This is an update of the original notice published on 2.2.2017.

Municipal Enterprise Batken Taza-Suu (Batken Water Company) intends using the proceeds of a loan and a grant from the European bank for reconstruction and development (EBRD or the bank) for a project to finance the rehabilitation and upgrade of the water supply and wastewater treatment infrastructure in the city of Batken. The proposed project, which has a total estimated cost of EUR 4 000 000 equivalent, will require the procurement of the following goods, works and services:
— Operation and maintenance equipment and machinery,
— rehabilitation of wastewater facilities and operational premises,
— water network upgrade and replacement including installation of water meters and leak detection/repairs (several lots/sections),
— rehabilitation of wastewater network and Wastewater Treatment Plant.
Tendering for the goods and works is expected to commence in the first quarter of 2018.

Contracts to be financed with the proceeds of a loan and a grant from the bank will be subject to the EBRD procurement policies and rules and will be open to firms from any country. The proceeds of the bank's loan and the grant will not be used for the purpose of any payment to persons or entities, of for any import of goods, if such payment or import is prohibited by a decision of the United Nations Security Council taken under Chapter VII of the Charter of the United Nations or under a law of official regulation of the purchaser's country.
Interested suppliers, contractors and consultants should contact:

ADDRESS_NOT_STRUCT.BLK_BTX: , Head of Project Implementation Unit. Building of the Mayor of Batken City,
. Head of Project Implementation Unit Tel.

— water network upgrade and replacement including installation of water meters and leak detection/repairs (several lots/sections),
— rehabilitation of wastewater network and Wastewater Treatment Plant.
Tendering for the goods and works is expected to commence in the first quarter of 2018.

Contracts to be financed with the proceeds of a loan and a grant from the bank will be subject to the EBRD procurement policies and rules and will be open to firms from any country. The proceeds of the bank's loan and the grant will not be used for the purpose of any payment to persons or entities, of for any import of goods, if such payment or import is prohibited by a decision of the United Nations Security Council taken under Chapter VII of the Charter of the United Nations or under a law of official regulation of the purchaser's country.
